nodes.title: 字段说明
nodes.text:
## 字段说明

|--------|------|
| drone | 无人机 |
| gateway | 机场 |
| sn | 设备编码 |
| callsign | 站点名称 |
| device_online_status | 设备状态 |
| mode_code | 模式编码 |
| camera_list | 相机清单 |
| device_model | 设备参数 |

nodes.title: 记录 1
nodes.summary: This document provides technical status and device information for a DJI drone system located at the Xiaonanhai Hydrological Station, detailing an online DJI Dock 2 gateway and an offline M3TD drone, including their serial numbers, model specifications, and camera configurations.

nodes.title: 记录 2
nodes.summary: This partial document, labeled "Record 2," provides technical specifications and status information for a gateway and a drone located at the Hehe Hydrological Station. It details the device models (DJI Dock 2 and M3TD), serial numbers, callsigns, and connection status, noting that the gateway is currently online while the drone is offline.

nodes.title: 记录 3
nodes.summary: This document provides technical details and operational status for equipment at the Panshitou Hydrological Station, specifically documenting a DJI Dock 2 gateway (which is online with an outdoor camera) and an M3TD drone (which is currently offline). It includes specific identifiers such as serial numbers, callsigns, model types, and device configurations for both units.

nodes.title: 记录 4
nodes.summary: This document provides technical specifications and real-time status information for hardware located at the Qimen Hydrological Station. It details a gateway (DJI Dock 2) which is currently online and equipped with an outdoor camera, and a drone (M3TD) which is currently offline. Key data points include serial numbers, callsigns, device model classifications, and operational mode codes for both pieces of equipment.

nodes.title: 记录 5
nodes.text:
### 记录 5

- **gateway:** {
  "sn": "7CTDM6F00B01QN",
  "callsign": "修武水文站机场",
  "device_model": {
    "key": "3-2-0",
    "domain": "3",
    "type": "2",
    "sub_type": "0",
    "name": "DJI Dock 2",
    "class": "airport"
  },
  "device_online_status": false,
  "mode_code": 0,
  "camera_list": [
    {
      "camera_index": "165-0-7",
      "available_camera_positions": [
        "indoor",
        "outdoor"
      ],
      "camera_position": "outdoor"
    }
  ]
}
- **drone:** {
  "sn": "1581F6Q8D246E00G8LJ7",
  "callsign": "修武水文站无人机",
  "device_model": {
    "key": "0-91-1",
    "domain": "0",
    "type": "91",
    "sub_type": "1",
    "name": "M3TD",
    "class": "drone"
  },
  "device_online_status": false,
  "mode_code": 0
}

nodes.summary: This partial document provides technical specifications and status information for a drone system identified as "Record 5" at the Xiuwu Hydrological Station. It details the device models, serial numbers, and callsigns for two primary components: a DJI Dock 2 gateway (airport) and an M3TD drone, noting that both devices are currently offline.
